content.title: Tablet Assistance to Scheduled Caste Students of 12th Standard
content.details: The “Tablet Assistance to Scheduled Caste Students” scheme is administered by the Director, Scheduled Caste Welfare, Government of Gujarat. Under the scheme, tablets are provided to students in the 12th standard who belong to the Scheduled Caste (SC) category.
benefits: Students in the 12th standard belonging to the Scheduled Caste category will receive a tablet by paying a token fee of ₹1,000/-.
eligibility: The student should belong to the Scheduled Caste of Gujarat.
The student should be studying in 12th Standard.
documents_required: Caste Certificate From the Competent Authority
First Page of Bank Passbook/Cancelled Cheque
Break Affidavit (If Break Gap is More than One Year)

faqs.question: Who administers the scheme?
faqs.answer: The scheme is administered by the Director, Scheduled Caste Welfare, Government of Gujarat.

faqs.question: What are the benefits offered under the scheme?
faqs.answer: Students in the 12th standard belonging to the Scheduled Caste category will receive a tablet by paying a token fee of ₹1,000/-.

faqs.question: What are the eligibility criteria for students to avail of the tablet assistance?
faqs.answer: The student must belong to the Scheduled Caste of Gujarat and be studying in the 12th standard.

faqs.question: Is there any income limit for eligibility?
faqs.answer: No, there is no income limit specified for eligibility under this scheme.

faqs.question: How can eligible students apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Eligible students can apply for the scheme through the Digital Gujarat Portal: https://www.digitalgujarat.gov.in/.

faqs.question: Can students from other states apply for this scheme?
faqs.answer: The scheme is for students belonging to the Scheduled Caste of Gujarat.
